abstract: colony northstar receives `` buy '' rating from b. riley .
article: colony northstar 's stock had its `` buy '' rating reissued by investment analysts at b. riley in a research note issued to investors on monday . they presently have a $ 15.00 price target on the real estate investment trust 's stock . b. riley 's target price would indicate a potential upside of 47.35 % from the stock 's previous close . clns has been the subject of a number of other reports . jmp securities raised shares of colony northstar from a `` market perform '' rating to an `` outperform '' rating and set a $ 13.00 price target for the company in a report on friday , january 5th .

zacks investment research downgraded shares of colony northstar from a `` hold '' rating to a `` sell '' rating in a report on wednesday , january 10th . fbr & co reissued a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 15.00 price target on shares of colony northstar in a report on tuesday , october 3rd . finally , valuengine raised shares of colony northstar from a `` buy '' rating to a `` strong-buy '' rating in a report on tuesday , january 16th . one analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating , five have issued a buy rating and one has assigned a strong buy rating to the stock .

colony northstar presently has a consensus rating of `` buy '' and an average target price of $ 16.05 . colony northstar traded up $ 0.04 during midday trading on monday , hitting $ 10.18 . 4,216,134 shares of the company traded hands , compared to its average volume of 4,090,000 . the company has a current ratio of 4.64 , a quick ratio of 4.64 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.95 . the company has a market cap of $ 5,550.00 , a p/e ratio of -254.50 and a beta of 1.46 . colony northstar has a fifty-two week low of $ 10.10 and a fifty-two week high of $ 14.74 .

colony northstar last posted its quarterly earnings data on thursday , november 9th . the real estate investment trust reported $ 0.33 earnings per share for the quarter , hitting the thomson reuters ' consensus estimate of $ 0.33 . the business had revenue of $ 788.90 million during the quarter , compared to the consensus estimate of $ 695.50 million . colony northstar had a net margin of 5.83 % and a return on equity of 1.88 % . colony northstar 's quarterly revenue was up 271.9 % on a year-over-year basis . sell-side analysts anticipate that colony northstar will post 1.04 earnings per share for the current fiscal year .

in other colony northstar news , insider neale redington sold 12,500 shares of the stock in a transaction on wednesday , december 20th . the shares were sold at an average price of $ 11.74 , for a total value of $ 146,750.00 . following the completion of the sale , the insider now directly owns 182,908 shares of the company 's stock , valued at approximately $ 2,147,339.92 . the sale was disclosed in a legal filing with the sec , which is available through the sec website . also , insider david t. hamamoto sold 2,225,909 shares of the firm 's stock in a transaction dated monday , december 18th .

wells fargo & company mn lifted its holdings in shares of colony northstar by 104.7 % during the 3rd quarter . wells fargo & company mn now owns 2,210,035 shares of the real estate investment trust 's stock worth $ 27,758,000 after acquiring an additional 1,130,318 shares during the period . dalton greiner hartman maher & co. . lifted its holdings in shares of colony northstar by 17.9 % during the 4th quarter . dalton greiner hartman maher & co. . now owns 1,734,802 shares of the real estate investment trust 's stock worth $ 19,794,000 after acquiring an additional 263,177 shares during the period .

schwab charles investment management inc. . lifted its holdings in shares of colony northstar by 4.4 % during the 4th quarter . schwab charles investment management inc. . now owns 1,703,827 shares of the real estate investment trust 's stock worth $ 19,441,000 after acquiring an additional 71,351 shares during the period . finally , jpmorgan chase & co. . lifted its holdings in shares of colony northstar by 79.8 % during the 3rd quarter . jpmorgan chase & co. . now owns 905,809 shares of the real estate investment trust 's stock worth $ 11,368,000 after acquiring an additional 402,062 shares during the period .
